snippet: The consumer advocacy group Public Citizen again calls for the bank to be broken up into smaller, less systematically important pieces. But this time, the message has a beat and you can dance to it.
abstract: The consumer advocacy group Public Citizen again calls for the bank to be broken up into smaller, less systematically important pieces. But this time, the message has a beat and you can dance to it.

headline.main: Breaking Up Bank of America, in Song
